description:
Hayato accidentally sees Rin`s breasts! And now he can`t stop thinking about it. She comes up with an unexpected way to fix this...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fuuki Iinchou to Banka no Omatsuri
La présidente du comité de discipline et le festival de fin d`été
Late Summer Festival with the Disciplinary Committee Head
風紀委員長と晩夏のお祭り
